pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Medium Carnivore $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() True $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Aggressive $(br)$(l)Type:$() Solo Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Cold Biomes

The Yutyrannus is a mid-sized, swift carnivore. It can walk over Powdered Snow and gain a speed buff when walking over it or normal snow. $(br2)Yutyrannus babies can be tamed. (See "Domestication" section.)
